abstract: An attack on the Republican candidate’s stance on same-sex marriage still dominates his search results.
snippet: An attack on the Republican candidate’s stance on same-sex marriage still dominates his search results.
lead_paragraph: 3:14 p.m. | Updated Coming within eight votes of victory in the Iowa caucus has brought new respect to Rick Santorum from the news media, and even prospective voters. Just not yet from the Google search engine, or Bing or Yahoo, for that matter.

headline.main: A Leader in Iowa, Santorum Still Has Trouble Online
